description:
Natsumi can hardly wait for Sports Day, because her mom is coming!  But then a last-minute work emergency holds her back, and the frogs wind up deciding to try all manner of crazy things to delay the events until Natsumi`s mom can make it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Icchidanketsu! Undoukai o Shinryaku Seyo de Arimasu
ケロロ 一致団結! 運動会を侵略せよ であります
